General.Name: Raydan Co
General.Description: Raydan Food Company operates restaurants in the Kingdom of Saud Arabia. The company operates through Traditional Meals and Other segments. It also provides catering services, as well as grants franchise rights. Additionally, it engages in real estate investments. The company was formerly known as Raydan Company. Raydan Food Company was founded in 2008 and is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

0.Name: Mr. Mansour Nasser Awadallah Ahmed Al-Sulami
0.Title: CEO, MD & Director
